name: FileFacade
doc: filesystem-related operations. none of the methods writing files to disk guarantee a fixed file name or location, except for putFileIntoDownloadsFolder.

open.doc: Opens the file with the built-in viewer or external program.

openFileChooser.doc: Opens OS file picker. Returns the list of URIs for the selected files. add a list of extensions (without dot) to filter the options.

openFolderChooser.doc: Opens OS file picker for selecting a folder. Only on desktop.

getSize.doc: get the absolute size in bytes of the file at the given location

putFileIntoDownloadsFolder.doc: move and rename a decrypted file from the decryption location to the download location preferred by the user and return the absolute path to the moved file

download.doc: download an encrypted file to the file system and return the location of the data

hashFile.doc: Calculates specified file hash (with SHA-256). Returns first 6 bytes of it as Base64.

joinFiles.doc: given a list of chunk file locations, will re-join them in order to reconstruct a single file and returns the location of that file on disk.

splitFile.doc: split a given file on disk into as many chunks as necessary to limit their size to the max byte size. returns the list of chunk file locations.

writeDataFile.doc: Save the unencrypted data file to the disk into a fixed temporary location, not the user's preferred download dir.

readDataFile.doc: read the file at the given location into a DataFile. Returns null if reading fails for any reason.
